panels.description: Count by Subject & Predicate over the time window

options.defaultContent: The query didn't return any results.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT COUNT(*) as count, subject, predicate, ARRAY[${subjects:sqlstring}]::text[]
FROM cdevents_lake
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND subject = ANY(ARRAY[${subjects:sqlstring}]::text[])
  AND predicate = ANY(ARRAY[${predicates:sqlstring}]::text[])
GROUP BY subject, predicate
ORDER BY subject, predicate

panels.title: How many events?

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  time_bucket('1 hour', timestamp) AS time,
  concat(subject,'.', predicate) AS kind,
  COUNT(*)
FROM cdevents_lake 
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND subject = ANY(ARRAY[${subjects:sqlstring}]::text[])
  AND predicate = ANY(ARRAY[${predicates:sqlstring}]::text[])
GROUP BY time, kind
ORDER BY time, kind

panels.description: Count by Context'source over the time window

options.defaultContent: The query didn't return any results.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT COUNT(*) as count, "payload" -> 'context' ->> 'source' as "context_source"
FROM cdevents_lake
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND subject = ANY(ARRAY[${subjects:sqlstring}]::text[])
  AND predicate = ANY(ARRAY[${predicates:sqlstring}]::text[])
GROUP BY context_source
ORDER BY context_source

panels.title: How many sources?

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  "timestamp",
  "subject",
  "predicate",
  "payload" -> 'subject' as "payload_subject",
  "payload" -> 'context' as "payload_context",
  "imported_at"
FROM
  cdevents_lake
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND subject = ANY(ARRAY[${subjects:sqlstring}]::text[])
  AND predicate = ANY(ARRAY[${predicates:sqlstring}]::text[])
ORDER BY
  imported_at DESC
LIMIT
  ${pageSize}
OFFSET
  ${offset}

SELECT
  count(*)
FROM
  cdevents_lake
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(imported_at)
  AND ('${subjects:raw}' = '' OR subject IN (${subjects:sqlstring}))
  AND ('${predicates:raw}' = '' OR predicate IN (${predicates:sqlstring}))

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT "subject" FROM "cdevents_lake" WHERE "subject" LIKE '$__searchFilter' AND $__timeFilter(imported_at)
list.label: subjects
list.name: subjects
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT "subject" FROM "cdevents_lake" WHERE "subject" LIKE '$__searchFilter' AND $__timeFilter(imported_at)

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT "predicate" FROM "cdevents_lake" WHERE "predicate" LIKE '$__searchFilter' AND subject IN ($subjects) AND $__timeFilter(imported_at)
list.label: predicates
list.name: predicates
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT "predicate" FROM "cdevents_lake" WHERE "predicate" LIKE '$__searchFilter' AND subject IN ($subjects) AND $__timeFilter(imported_at)

list.description: The number of rows per page. Specify as a dashboard variable name.
list.label: pageSize
list.name: pageSize

list.description: Page order number. Specify as a dashboard variable name.
list.name: pageIndex

list.description: How many rows to skip starting from the first. Specify as a dashboard variable name.
list.name: offset
